Detailed Description

This interface is used to change the input/output of XINX

virtual QString IXinxInputOutputPlugin::getFilename ( const QString &  filename,
const QString &  defaultFilename,
const QString &  filter,
bool  saveAs,
bool &  accept,
QWidget *  widget = 0 
) [pure virtual]

For the given filename, get a a dialog box to save the file. If the the accept boolean is true, XINX don't call other plugin. If the file return false, the save is cancelled, else, the save is called.
